overview.professionalStatement: Please note, Spring Street Dermatology has a 24 hour cancellation policy. Patients who cancel or reschedule with less than 24 hours notice may need to pay a cancellation fee. New patients are also required to come in 15 minutes prior to their scheduled appointment time to register into our system. Dr. Palep is a clinical instructor at Mount Sinai Department of Dermatology, where she donates her time to teach residents. In her private practice, she offers complete medical, surgical and cosmetic dermatology services.
